page.title: 07Notable Events in Lezant
page.content: {Lezant Horticultural Show}is held on the Jubilee Field during August.The show costs Â£1000 and there is a good response from the Parish.When one show is finished the committee of twelve start work on the next year's show. {Lezant Fete}is held in the Rectory garden during July. {Trebullett Chapel Anniversary}falls on the second Sunday and Monday in May. {Trekenner School.}The PTA organise an annual Christmas Bazaar and Summer Fair.This year the school sports day will involve the children of Coads Green,Lewannick,South Petherwin and Trekenner Schools. {Guides and Brownies.}The local groups have been participating in the 75th Anniversary celebrations this year.
